subject: Football
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Firearms
lead_paragraph: Cleveland Browns linebacker Armonty Bryant will not play in Sunday’s game at Kansas City after he and safety De’Ante Saunders were arrested Friday morning in a traffic stop.
snippet: Cleveland Browns linebacker Armonty Bryant will not play in Sunday’s game at Kansas City after he and safety De’Ante Saunders were arrested Friday morning in a traffic stop.
